xxl.core.io
Class LogFilesystemOperations

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.io.LogFilesystemOperations
All Implemented Interfaces:
FilesystemOperations
public class LogFilesystemOperations
extends Object
implements FilesystemOperations

This class logs all calls to a FilesystemOperations object.

          FilesystemOperations object to be logged.

          Log every access or only errors?

          Output Stream

Constructor Detail

LogFilesystemOperations

public LogFilesystemOperations(FilesystemOperations fso,
                               PrintStream ps,
                               boolean logOnlyErrors)
Constructs an object which logs filesystem operations.

Parameters:
fso - FilesystemOperations object which is logged.
ps - PrintStream which is used for the output.
logOnlyErrors - determines if only errors are reported or everything.
Method Detail

openFile

public RandomAccessFile openFile(String fileName,
                                 String mode)
Opens a file and returns a RandomAccessFile.

Specified by:
openFile in interface FilesystemOperations
Parameters:
fileName - the name of the file.
mode - the access mode ("r" or "rw").
Returns:
the new RandomAccessFile or null, if the operation was not successful.

Determines if a file exists or not.

Specified by:
fileExists in interface FilesystemOperations
Parameters:
fileName - the name of the file to be checked.
Returns:
true iff the file exists.

Renames the name of a file to a new name.

Specified by:

Parameters:
